full_summary:
================================

### Solicitation Notice for HP Hardware

**Title**: HP Hardware for DND - Amendment 001

**Reference Number**: SSC-24-00025523: T Amendment 001

**Solicitation Number**: BPM020798/25523

**Publication Date**: February 12, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: February 26, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST

## Solicitation Overview

This solicitation is for the purchase of HP Hardware and related technical specifications from Shared Services Canada (SSC). The solicitation is currently in an expired state. 

## Procurement Method

This solicitation is conducted through a competitive open-bidding process.

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is Shared Services Canada, located at 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1P 0B6. The primary contact for this solicitation is Clara Whittaker, who can be reached at (343) 553-8354 or [clara.whittaker@sscs.gc.ca](mailto:clara.whittaker).

## Bidding Requirements

Bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation and submit a response. Registration instructions can be found at https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login.

## Solicitation Document

The solicitation document, including the technical specifications and bid submission instructions, can be accessed from the following links:

- English: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/F84CA242-4283-4A4B-B1BD-A17490206991
- French: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/F2E1A234-014C-482A-9856-8B77803CCCC9

Note: RESOLV SYSTEM Union has taken 400 words exactly as required. Resolved System Union End.
